How it works

1

Enable Microphone

Ensure your device's microphone is enabled and that our app has permission to access it.

2

Activate Voice Commands

Look for the "Let's Talk" button in the website and click on it to activate voice commands

3

Speak Clearly

Use commands like "Send money to [Person]" or "Create Account" and speak clearly.
